trans-unit.source: Represents a connector between two activity designers on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Representa um conector entre dois designers de atividade em uma superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A connector is the line that appears on a workflow design surface that connects one activity designer to another.
trans-unit.target: Um conector é a linha que aparece em uma superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho que se conecta a um designer de atividade para outra.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> provides methods and properties that allow you to customize how to draw a set of connectors when an activity designer is rendered at design time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector> fornece métodos e propriedades que permitem que você personalize como desenhar um conjunto de conectores quando um designer de atividade é renderizado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> where drawing for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> begins.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> no local em que o desenho para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> começa.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> where drawing for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> ends.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> no local em que o desenho para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> termina.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> or <paramref name="target" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> ou <paramref name="target" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that accessibility applications use to adjust the application UI for users who have impairments.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> que aplicativos de acessibilidade usam para ajustar a interface do usuário do aplicativo para usuários com deficiências.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that accessibility applications use to adjust the application UI for users who have impairments.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> que aplicativos de acessibilidade usam para ajustar o interface do usuário do aplicativo para usuários com deficiências.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle for the connector on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o retângulo delimitador para o conector na superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that bounds the connector on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que circunda o conector na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> is modified.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> é modificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the connector is modified; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o conector for modificado; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of points that contains all segments found in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de pontos somente leitura que contém todos os segmentos encontrados no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> read-only collection that contains all segments found in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> coleção somente leitura que contém todos os segmentos encontrada no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> to compare with the current connector.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> a ser comparado com o conector atual.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> is equal to the specified connector.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> atual é igual ao conector especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified connector is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o conector especificado for igual ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> atual; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Equals verifies that both the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Source%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Target%2A> properties of the two connectors hold references to the same <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> objects.
trans-unit.target: Igual a verifica que tanto o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Source%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Target%2A> propriedades dois conectores possuem referências para o mesmo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Returns an empty array of Rectangle object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma matriz vazia de objeto de retângulo.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes populate this collection.
trans-unit.target: As classes derivadas populam esta coleção.

trans-unit.source: A generic collection of Rectangle objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção genérica de objetos do retângulo.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" />.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the service object to return.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> do objeto de serviço a ser retornado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a service object of the specified type if it is available.
trans-unit.target: Retornará um objeto de serviço do tipo especificado, se estiver disponível.

trans-unit.source: A service object of type <paramref name="serviceType" /> or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) if there is no service object of type <paramref name="serviceType" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de serviço do tipo <paramref name="serviceType" /> ou uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic) se não houver nenhum objeto de serviço do tipo <paramref name="serviceType" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.GetService%2A> returns the service object available through <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ParentDesigner%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.GetService%2A> Retorna o objeto de serviço disponível por meio de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ParentDesigner%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> a ser testado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified point resides on the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o ponto especificado reside no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="point" /> resides on the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="point" /> residir no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> atual; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Typically, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.HitTest%2A> indicates whether a user has clicked a point on a connector displayed on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.HitTest%2A> indica se um usuário clicou com um ponto em um conector exibido em uma superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> and causes it to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Invalida o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> atual e o faz ser redesenhado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Invalidate%2A> causes all contents found in <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Bounds%2A> to be included in the update region for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ParentDesigner%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Invalidate%2A> faz com que todo o conteúdo localizado em <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Bounds%2A> devem ser incluídos na região de atualização para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ParentDesigner%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that contains the height and width settings to offset the connector.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que contém as configurações de altura e de largura a serem deslocadas para o conector.

trans-unit.source: Changes the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> height and width using the settings defined in the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.
trans-unit.target: Altera a altura e a largura do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> usando as configurações definidas no <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> that layout operations are occurring.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> de que estão ocorrendo operações de layout.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.OnLayout%2A> clears <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ConnectorSegments%2A> and repopulates it with a new range of points.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.OnLayout%2A> Limpa <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ConnectorSegments%2A> e preenche-o com um novo intervalo de pontos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> that contains the drawing data.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> que contém os dados de desenho.

trans-unit.source: Renders the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Renderiza o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> na superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> object that specifies the graphics to use to draw the object and the clipping rectangle in which to draw it.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> que especifica os elementos gráficos a serem usados para desenhar o objeto e o retângulo de recorte no qual desenhá-lo.

trans-unit.source: Coordinates for the segments in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" />.
trans-unit.target: Coordenadas dos segmentos no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" />.

trans-unit.source: Coordinated for the edit points on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" />.
trans-unit.target: Coordenado para os pontos de edição no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" />.

trans-unit.source: Used for drawing the Connector when it is dragged from one state to another.
trans-unit.target: Usado para desenhar o conector quando ele é arrastado de um estado para outro.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a user is creating a connector, moving a middle point or moving an endpoint from one activity to another.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é chamado quando um usuário está criando um conector, mover um ponto intermediário ou mover um ponto de extremidade de uma atividade para outra.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> object that specifies the graphics to use to draw the object and the clipping rectangle in which to draw it.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> que especifica os elementos gráficos a serem usados para desenhar o objeto e o retângulo de recorte no qual desenhá-lo.

trans-unit.source: Not used.
trans-unit.target: Não usado.

trans-unit.source: Coordinates for the edit points on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" />.
trans-unit.target: Coordenadas para os pontos de edição no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" />.

trans-unit.source: Used for drawing a Connector that is selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: Usado para desenhar um conector selecionado pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer on which the connecter appears on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o designer no qual o conector aparece na superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> on which the connector appears on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner" /> em que o conector aparece na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the workflow view associated with the connector.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a exibição do fluxo de trabalho associada ao conector.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" /> that is associated with the connector.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" /> que está associado com o conector.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ParentView%2A> provides access to the workflow design surface on which the connector appears.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ParentView%2A> fornece acesso à superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho no qual o conector apareça.

trans-unit.source: Performs layout tasks for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" />.
trans-unit.target: Executa tarefas de layout para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.PerformLayout%2A> calls the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.PerformLayout%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and specifies that the layout update does not need to occur immediately.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.PerformLayout%2A> chama o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.PerformLayout%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método e especifica que a atualização de layout não precisa ocorrer imediatamente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> collection that represents the new connector segments to use for rerouting.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que representa os novos segmentos de conector a serem usados para redirecionamento.

trans-unit.source: Reroutes the connector from source to target if the connector has changed.
trans-unit.target: Redirecionará o conector da origem para o destino se o conector tiver sido alterado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> where drawing of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> begins.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> em que o desenho do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> começa.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> where drawing of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> begins.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> onde o desenho do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> começa.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property the source <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner" /> does not match the target associated designer.
trans-unit.target: Ao configurar essa propriedade, o <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner" /> de origem não corresponde ao designer associado de destino.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Source" /> was set to a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Source" /> foi definido como uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> where drawing of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> ends.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> em que o desenho do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> termina.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> where drawing of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> ends.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint" /> onde o desenho da <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector" /> termina.

trans-unit.source: When setting this property the source <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner" /> does not match the target associated designer.
trans-unit.target: Ao configurar essa propriedade, o <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner" /> de origem não corresponde ao designer associado de destino.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Target" /> was set to a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Target" /> foi definido como uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).
